snippet: The company plans to introduce a retail banking operation called Marcus, which will offer small consumer loans, which Goldman has traditionally avoided....
abstract: Goldman Sachs is set to unveil its online retail banking operation Marcus, which will offer small consumer loans, most likely in October.
lead_paragraph: The company plans to introduce a retail banking operation called Marcus, which will offer small consumer loans, which Goldman has traditionally avoided.

headline.main: Meet Marcus, Goldman Sachs’s Online Lender for the Masses
headline.print_headline: An Online Lender for the Masses, From Goldman
